Title: Mondo cane
Director: Paolo Cavara, Gualtiero Jacopetti, Franco Prosperi
Actors: Stefano Sibaldi, Rossano Brazzi, Yves Klein, Henning Skaarup
Plot: Nominally a documentary, this film combines a number of unrelated sequences (both real and staged) -- including a South Pacific "cargo cult", the ritual slaughter of a bull, tribal dances and rituals, and a visit to an ornate pet cemetery -- all focused on the lurid, sensational, and eccentric.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.
